source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000010_ALISAIE<tab>I'm glad you've come, though I'm afraid there's little in the way of good news.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000010_ALISAIE<tab>来てくれたのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000020_ALISAIE<tab>After you left, we reached out to both the Alchemists' Guild and Stillglade Fane, and attempted all manner of treatments...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000020_ALISAIE<tab>あれから、ウルダハの錬金術師ギルドや、
グリダニアの幻術士ギルドにも協力を求めて、
みんなの治療を試みてきたんだけど……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000030_ALISAIE<tab>But the results were always the same. Whatever the answer is, it's not alchemy or conjury...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000030_ALISAIE<tab>結局、倒れた原因すらわからないまま。
依然として彼らの意識は戻らず、昏睡状態が続いているわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000040_ALISAIE<tab>Why did it have to be Y'shtola and Urianger, and not me? Out of all of us, they are the ones who could feasibly have solved this puzzle.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000040_ALISAIE<tab>こんなとき、頼りになるヤ・シュトラやウリエンジェが、
ことごとく倒れちゃってるのは痛いわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000050_ALISAIE<tab>And Alphinaud's still missing. Gods, it's all going wrong... Where do we even start?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000050_ALISAIE<tab>アルフィノの安否もわからないままだし、
どこから手を付けて、何を糸口にすればいいんだか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000060_KRILE<tab>(-???-)A grave situation, indeed. Might I be of some assistance?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000060_KRILE<tab>(-？？？？-)大分、深刻なようね。
先輩としてお役に立てればいいんだけど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000070_ALISAIE<tab>Krile! I thought you busy delving into the mysteries of Eureka...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000070_ALISAIE<tab>クルル！
エウレカの調査はもういいの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000080_ALISAIE<tab>Krile! I did not think you well enough to travel...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000080_ALISAIE<tab>クルル！
体調の方はもう大丈夫なの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000090_KRILE<tab>When word reached me of the plight of our friends, I could not well stay away. As a fellow Scion, not to mention your erstwhile mentor, this is one of those times you should feel free to call on me─regardless of my personal circumstances.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000090_KRILE<tab>仲間が倒れたと聞いて、駆けつけないわけにいかないでしょ。
私だって「暁」の一員だし、あなたの大学時代の先輩なんだから、
少しは頼りにしてほしいものだわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000100_ALISAIE<tab>I... Yes, I should have thought of that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000100_ALISAIE<tab>そうか……そうよね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000110_ALISAIE<tab>Thank you for coming, Krile. We would welcome your insight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000110_ALISAIE<tab>ありがとうクルル、とても心強いわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000120_KRILE<tab>And I should be happy to provide it. Now, what's this I hear about Alphinaud heading into imperial territory? That boy always did have some funny ideas. Do you remember the speech he gave when he was accepted to the Studium?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000120_KRILE<tab>それにしても、アルフィノくんが帝国に向かうなんてね。
相変わらず、突飛なことをするもんだわ……。
彼が魔法大学に入学したときの自己紹介を覚えてる？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000130_ALISAIE<tab>“My life's goal is naught less than the salvation of this star!”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000130_ALISAIE<tab>私には夢がある、それはこの世界を救済することだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000140_KRILE<tab>[LAUGHTER]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000140_KRILE<tab>クククククク……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000150_ALISAIE<tab>[LAUGHTER]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000150_ALISAIE<tab>アハハハハハ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000160_KRILE<tab>That particular grand pronouncement has been a source of great embarrassment to him, as you know. But the fact of the matter is, he meant every word, and has lived his life accordingly.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000160_KRILE<tab>さすがに今では恥ずかしがっているけれど、
当時のアルフィノくんは本気だったし、
今でも、真剣に「世界の救済」を実現しようとしている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000170_ALISAIE<tab>Yes, he remains altruistic to a fault. But I'm worried he was too fixated on his goals to see the dangers, as has happened before...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000170_ALISAIE<tab>そうね……。
アルフィノは昔から馬鹿みたいに一貫してるわ。
でも、たまに大きな失敗もしでかすから、心配なのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000180_KRILE<tab>You needn't be so concerned. Though his values remain the same, Alphinaud is not the blinkered boy he once was. Slowly but surely, his eyes have been opened─thanks to a certain someone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000180_KRILE<tab>大丈夫、彼は思っているよりも、ずっと大人になったわ。
……誰かさんのおかげで、ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000190_KRILE<tab>A certain someone whom he'd be mortified to learn had heard about his little speech. Mum's the word, eh?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000190_KRILE<tab>でも、自己紹介の件をバラしたことはナイショよ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000200_KRILE<tab>Right, I had better have a look at our patients. They're in the infirmary, I assume? I'll need absolute quiet, so it would be best if I did this alone. If you'll excuse me...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000200_KRILE<tab>さあ、みんなの容態を看させてもらうわ。
奥の部屋でいいのよね？
集中することになると思うから、ふたりはここで待っていて。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000210_KRILE<tab>All three are in fine physical health. At a glance, I would say they were merely sound asleep...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000210_KRILE<tab>3人とも、肉体的には健康そのものね……。
一見、深い眠りについているだけにも見えるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000220_KRILE<tab>...Except for the fact that I couldn't sense the slightest trace of “them” in their bodies. It's as if their souls have taken leave of their physical forms.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000220_KRILE<tab>ただ……どういうわけか、彼らの肉体からは、
まったく意思の力を感じ取れなかったの。
まるで、魂が抜けだしてしまったかのように……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000230_ALISAIE<tab>Ah. Yes. The Elder Seedseer made a similar observation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000230_ALISAIE<tab>それって……
カヌ・エ様も同じことを言っていたわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000240_KRILE<tab>I've read the report. When you heard this mysterious voice, you described feeling as if you were “somewhere else,” yes?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000240_KRILE<tab>アリゼーからの報告書は読んだんだけど、
あなた、以前に例の声を聞いたとき、
違う空間に立っているような感覚に襲われたのよね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000250_KRILE<tab>If we assume the aether which comprises your essence is being drawn to some other place...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000250_KRILE<tab>それを、魂を構成するエーテルそのものが、
どこかに呼ばれているのだと仮定すれば……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000260_KRILE<tab>Then it may be possible to follow the trail it leaves behind, just as we did in our search for Thancred.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000260_KRILE<tab>以前、サンクレッドさんの捜索をしたときのように、
意思の痕跡を辿ることで、何かが掴めるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000270_ALISAIE<tab>I wasn't around for that. But I can't imagine it was easy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000270_ALISAIE<tab>消えた魂を探すなんて、雲を掴むような話だけれど……
本当にそんなことができるの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000280_KRILE<tab>Oh, it wasn't. But that's no reason not to try. I will have need of Master Matoya's Crystal Eye if I'm even to make the attempt, so I suggest we pay her a visit.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000280_KRILE<tab>確信はないけど、やれることはやっておかないとね。
とにかく、試すには「水晶の目」が必要だから、
マトーヤ様のもとへ向かいましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000290_MATOYA<tab>Come to disturb my peace again, have you? I hide myself away in a cave, and <var 1A 02 /var>still<var 1A 01 /var> you people insist on pestering me with your problems.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000290_MATOYA<tab>やれやれ、またお前たちかい。
一向にお迎えは来ないのに、厄介者ばかりやって来るもんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000300_MATOYA<tab>Oh. I mistook you for young what's-his-name, but I see now you're the sister. Weren't you supposed to be the lively one? I've seen happier faces at a rain-sodden burial.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000300_MATOYA<tab>フン……ルヴェユールの小僧かと思ったら、小娘の方とはね。
あのはな垂れよりも、活発だって聞いてたけれど、
なんだい、まるで葬式みたいな面をしてるじゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000310_ALISAIE<tab>Well, I'm sorry to dash your expectations, but the situation isn't exactly conducive to gaiety.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000310_ALISAIE<tab>……お言葉ですけど！
いくらお祖父様の知り合いだからって、失礼じゃない！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000320_MATOYA<tab>Ah, that's more like it. Shtola used to spit and hiss like a wildcat, too. Better for a young thing like you to be filled with fire, and leave the doom and gloom to your elders.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000320_MATOYA<tab>よしよし、小娘はそのくらいで丁度いいのさ。
シュトラなんて、野良猫同然だったもんさね……。
辛気臭い面なんぞ、老いぼれに任せておけばいいんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000330_MATOYA<tab>Now, what exactly does this tragic situation of yours have to do with me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000330_MATOYA<tab>で、今度はどんな厄介事を持ってきたんだい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000340_KRILE<tab>If I may, Master Matoya, we have need of your Crystal Eye once more...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000340_KRILE<tab>マトーヤ様、もう一度、「水晶の目」を……
古の「光のクリスタル」をお貸しいただけませんか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000350_MATOYA<tab>And Shtola is one of the afflicted, is she?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000350_MATOYA<tab>あのシュトラが……ね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000360_MATOYA<tab>Very well. She may be an ungrateful stray, but she's <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> ungrateful stray. And I'll not see her buried before I am.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000360_MATOYA<tab>わかった、やんちゃな野良猫でも弟子なんだ。
ワシより先に死なせるわけにはいかない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000370_KRILE<tab>Right. Let us see what we can see.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000370_KRILE<tab>それじゃあ、私の超える力を、
この「水晶の目」を通して発現させてみるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000380_KRILE<tab>I'll begin from where our friends first fell, and cast my senses out from there...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000380_KRILE<tab>賢人のみんなが昏倒した場所から、
念入りに、意思の痕跡を辿ってみる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000390_ALISAIE<tab>...What is it? Did you find them!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000390_ALISAIE<tab>ど、どうだったの……？
……みんなの魂の行方は……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000400_KRILE<tab>Th-This doesn't make sense. How is it even possible...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000400_KRILE<tab>……ダメ、わからない。
いったいどういうこと、何が起きているというの……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000410_ALISAIE<tab>How is <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var> possible!? Krile, what did you see!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000410_ALISAIE<tab>ね、ねえ、わかる範囲で説明して！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000420_KRILE<tab>Th-The threads, they just...they just ended. And, no, I didn't lose track of them─I followed them as far as they went. It's as if─ It's as if they were cut off.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000420_KRILE<tab>感じ取れないんじゃないの……。
意思の痕跡が、プツリと消えてしまっていることが、
はっきりと認識できるのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000430_ALISAIE<tab>Could their aether have dissipated? If it had─ Oh gods...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000430_ALISAIE<tab>まさか……魂が消えてしまったってこと？
そ、そんな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000440_ALISAIE<tab>Their bodies are just husks. It's like the broodmother's daughter all over again...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000440_ALISAIE<tab>肉体だけが生きていて、魂がないなんて……
まるで、アナンタ族の……カリヤナの族長の娘じゃない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000450_KRILE<tab>No, no, this is different. The Qalyana girl was already dead, body and soul, when Lakshmi effected her resurrection.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000450_KRILE<tab>いえ、それは違う……と、思うわ。
アナンタ族の娘さんの場合、肉体を含めて、
一度、死を迎えてからラクシュミに復活させられたはず……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000460_MATOYA<tab>Aye, let's not jump to conclusions. If their physical forms yet breathe and show no signs of wasting, then it follows that their souls must still be intact somewhere.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000460_MATOYA<tab>フン、早合点はいけないよ。
肉体が生き続けていて、衰弱の兆候もないのなら、
魂もまた、いずこかで存在しているはずさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000470_ALISAIE<tab>But <var 1A 02 /var>where<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000470_ALISAIE<tab>だとすると、みんなの魂は、
いったい、どこへ……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000480_MATOYA<tab>That's the question, isn't it, girl? Death has not taken them to the aetherial sea, yet there are no tracks left for us to follow.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000480_MATOYA<tab>死してエーテル界に還ったのでもなく、
さりとて痕跡がない以上……
さて、どう探せばいいものか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000490_ALISAIE<tab>We're no closer to an answer than when we started. But knowing their souls are still out there is progress of a sort. We just have to keep looking.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000490_ALISAIE<tab>調査は、振り出しに戻ったみたいね……。
でも、みんなの魂は消えてしまったわけじゃない。
それがはっきりしただけでも、前に進めるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000500_ALISAIE<tab>Pray excuse me a moment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000500_ALISAIE<tab>ごめんなさい、通信だわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000510_ALISAIE<tab>Yes? ...I remember, but─ ...What, to <var 1A 02 /var>Ala Mhigo<var 1A 01 /var>!? We're on our way!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000510_ALISAIE<tab>はい……うん……うん…………ええっ！？
わかった、すぐに行く！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000520_ALISAIE<tab>That was Lyse. Apparently, a group of Populares have defected to Ala Mhigo, and Maxima─the envoy Alphinaud left with─is one of them!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000520_ALISAIE<tab>リセから緊急の報せよ。
アラミゴに帝国の民衆派が亡命してきたって！
それも、あのマキシマ大使が一緒らしいの！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000530_ALISAIE<tab>I'm sorry, I realize we've barely begun here, but...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000530_ALISAIE<tab>クルル、それからマトーヤ様、
悪いんだけど、私……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000540_MATOYA<tab>Go, child, go. You've made up your mind, and life's too short for dithering.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000540_MATOYA<tab>やることが決まったのなら、さっさと行きな。
若いうちは立ち止まっているヒマなんてないんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000550_KRILE<tab>I'll do some digging in the meantime, and see if there isn't some other method we could use to continue the search.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000550_KRILE<tab>それじゃあ、私は引き続き、
魂の行方を探る方法がないか、調査をしてみるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000560_ALISAIE<tab>Let's be off, then!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000560_ALISAIE<tab>あなたも一緒に来て！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000570_MATOYA<tab>Bah, not again... The enchantment barely seems to take, these days. I'd chalk it up to old age, but I rather doubt it's that simple.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000570_MATOYA<tab>やれやれ、またかい……。
ここ最近、「魔法仕掛けのホウキ」の動きが弱くてね。
ワシの歳のせいならともかく……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000580_ALISAIE<tab>Before they...took ill, Y'shtola and Urianger were sharing notes on a “thinning” of the aether. It seems to be happening all over.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000580_ALISAIE<tab>そういえば、ヤ・シュトラとウリエンジェも、
各地で環境エーテルに異変が起きていると言っていたわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000590_MATOYA<tab>Does it now? And here I was, all set to blame my woes on that creaking mountain of refuse clogging up the Thaliak.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000590_MATOYA<tab>ふむん……。
サリャク河のデカブツの影響じゃないってわけかい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000600_MATOYA<tab>I fear something has gone awry. Still, there's naught to be gained from starting at shadows. You can only do what can be done, and that but one thing at a time!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000600_MATOYA<tab>何やら嫌な予感がするね……。
とはいえ、闇雲に恐れを抱いてもはじまりゃしない。
今は、やれることを、順繰りに片付けておやり。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000610_LYSE<tab>I'm sorry to drag you halfway across the realm, but when Maxima mentioned Alphinaud, I thought you'd want to hear the news in person.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000610_LYSE<tab>急に呼び出したりしてごめん。
マキシマさんから、アルフィノの名前が出たから、
すぐに連絡しなきゃと思って……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000620_MAXIMA<tab>Ah, we meet again...though I was hoping our reunion would be under more auspicious circumstances.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000620_MAXIMA<tab>これは……お久しぶりです。
まさか、こちらでお目にかかれるとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000630_ALISAIE<tab>What happened to my brother? Where is Alphinaud?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000630_ALISAIE<tab>兄は……アルフィノはどうなったの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000640_MAXIMA<tab>Never fear, my lady. Your brother was in fine health when I took my leave of him, and I have no reason to assume that has changed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000640_MAXIMA<tab>よく似ておられると思いましたが、
ご身内の方でしたか……。
ご安心ください、恐らく彼は無事です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000650_ALISAIE<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>assume<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000650_ALISAIE<tab>おそらくって、どういう……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000660_MAXIMA<tab>If you will allow me, I shall endeavor to explain events.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000660_MAXIMA<tab>どうか落ち着いて、順を追って説明させてください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000670_MAXIMA<tab>Our troubles began not long after we departed Doma. While crossing the Burn, we were fired upon by the Emperor's personal guard, and forced to make an emergency landing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000670_MAXIMA<tab>実は、ドマを発ってからほどなく、
我々の艦は永久焦土地帯の上空にて、
皇帝親衛軍の襲撃を受け、不時着を余儀なくされました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000680_MAXIMA<tab>As we stumbled from the wreckage, our attackers fell upon us again, and we would have perished there and then were it not for the intercession of a third party... A band of mercenaries whose leader claimed to pursue a vendetta against the Ascians.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000680_MAXIMA<tab>さらに脱出後も追撃を受けたのですが……
そこで我々は、「影の狩人」と名乗る、
アシエンとの戦いを掲げる者たちに救われたのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000690_MAXIMA<tab>This “Shadowhunter,” as he styled himself, then escorted us out of the wastes to relative safety.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000690_MAXIMA<tab>私とアルフィノさんを含む生存者は、
その人物らに同行し、属州のひとつへと向かいました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000700_MAXIMA<tab>Upon arriving back in civilization, I gathered my Populares colleagues and prepared to flee the Empire. Master Alphinaud, however, declined the invitation to join us, preferring to continue his investigation into the Ascian threat.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000700_MAXIMA<tab>我々はそこで民衆派の同志たちと合流……
ともに避難をとお誘いしたのですが、
アルフィノさんは、アシエンの追跡を続ける、と。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000710_ALISAIE<tab>Well...at least he's not lying in a heap in the Burn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000710_ALISAIE<tab>アルフィノは……ザ・バーンから脱出できたのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000720_ALISAIE<tab>Tell us more about these Ascian hunters. Who are they? And is Alphinaud still with them?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000720_ALISAIE<tab>それにしても、アシエンとの戦いを掲げる者たちですって？
じゃあ、アルフィノはその影の狩人ってのと一緒に？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000730_MAXIMA<tab>He is. As to who they are, I am afraid I have nothing to tell you. Beyond the fact that they root out and destroy Ascians, they were unwilling to divulge anything which might serve to identify them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000730_MAXIMA<tab>彼らは各地でアシエンを討伐してまわっているようでしたが、
多くは語らず、素性を明かそうとはしませんでした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000740_MAXIMA<tab>They would not even reveal their next destination...but Master Alphinaud asked to accompany them all the same.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000740_MAXIMA<tab>その行先も聞き出すことはできず……
それでも、アルフィノさんは、ともに行くとおっしゃいました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000750_MAXIMA<tab>Since parting company with your brother, we've been engaged in a game of cat and mouse with the Emperor's guard. We made our way through province after province, finding the army busy “restoring order” wherever we went, until we finally arrived here in Ala Mhigo. I cannot thank Commander Aldynn enough for giving us such an unexpectedly warm welcome.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000750_MAXIMA<tab>我々はといえば、皇帝親衛軍から逃れるため、
粛清の嵐が吹き荒れる属州を脱し、亡命してきた次第です……。
受け入れてくださった、ラウバーン様には感謝しかありません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000760_RAUBAHN<tab>I'm not inclined to turn away refugees, no matter which land they call home. And if they can tell me how things lie in Garlemald...all the better.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000760_RAUBAHN<tab>たとえ敵国の民であっても、
傷つき疲れ果てた者たちを、突き返すことはできん。
それに、こちらとしても、帝国の内情を知りたいのでな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000770_MAXIMA<tab>On that subject, there is much I would tell you. During the course of our journey, we heard tales that an entire rebel army had been slaughtered in the space of a single night.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000770_MAXIMA<tab>それにつきましては、ご報告せねばならないことが……。
逃避行の最中で、反乱を起こした属州民たちの勢力が、
一夜にして全滅したという話を聞きました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000780_MAXIMA<tab>It would seem my former comrades grew tired of putting down uprisings in the conventional manner, and chose instead to bring a formidable new weapon to bear. Details were sparse, but the rumor alone was enough to dampen the flames of rebellion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000780_MAXIMA<tab>相次ぐ反乱に業を煮やした軍部が、新兵器を投入したとか。
詳細は定かでありませんが、これ以降、抵抗活動は、
下火になりつつあるようです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000790_MAXIMA<tab>I have also heard reports that several companies have withdrawn from their designated provinces and begun marching westward. It is my assessment that the Empire's forces are mobilizing for a large-scale military engagement.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000790_MAXIMA<tab>それから、いくつかの属州で、
駐留部隊が西に向けて移動を開始したとの情報もあります。
大規模な軍事行動の前触れではないかと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000800_LYSE<tab>Westward? You mean they're getting ready to invade Ala Mhigo!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000800_LYSE<tab>西へ……？
それってつまり、アラミゴへの再侵攻の準備ってこと！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000810_RAUBAHN<tab>We knew this was coming. But not that it would be so soon.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000810_RAUBAHN<tab>いずれこのときが来るとは覚悟していたが、
帝国軍の動きが、こうも早いとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000820_LYSE<tab>We've barely even begun to shore up our defenses! They won't stop an invading army!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000820_LYSE<tab>ラウバーン……
急いで国境の防備を固めているとはいっても、
まだ準備が……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000830_RAUBAHN<tab>...No, they won't.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000830_RAUBAHN<tab>わかっている……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000840_RAUBAHN<tab>Dispatch messengers to the Alliance leadership requesting reinforcements. And send word to our officers in the field to hasten completion of those border fortifications. Prepare to meet the imperials head-on!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000840_RAUBAHN<tab>同盟各国と国境守備隊に使者を出せ……！
援軍の派遣を要請しつつ、帝国領との国境地帯に、
防衛陣地を設営……帝国の進軍に備えるのだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000850_RAUBAHN<tab>No matter how quickly we act, we still want for time. When the enemy comes into view, our best recourse will be to open negotiations with their commander, and see that the ensuing proceedings take as long as possible.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000850_RAUBAHN<tab>だが、急がせたとて時間が足りん。
敵軍が視認でき次第、停戦交渉の使者でも出して、
少しでも時間稼ぎをするしかあるまい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000860_LYSE<tab>Would you and Alisaie head to Doma and let Lord Hien know about this? I'm sure he'll want to hear about Alphinaud too.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000860_LYSE<tab>悪いんだけど、あなたとアリゼーには、
ドマへ向かってもらって、ヒエンにこの件を伝えてほしいんだ。
アルフィノのことも心配していると思うし……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000870_ALISAIE<tab>Consider it done. We'll send word when─
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000870_ALISAIE<tab>わかったわ、任せておいて。
それじゃあ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...Untold sorrow... Must be changed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>その道――歴史――ならない――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ahead looms a calamity...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>今 再び霊災のとき――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Eon become instant. Throw wide the gates.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>時空を超えよ――門を開け――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000910_ALISAIE<tab>You heard it too?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000910_ALISAIE<tab>あ……あなたにも、
また、あの声が聞こえたみたいね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000920_ALISAIE<tab>Well, at least we're both still standing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000920_ALISAIE<tab>でも、どちらとも、何ともないわ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000930_LYSE<tab>Oh, thank the gods─I thought we'd lost you for a moment there. Why does this keep happening!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000930_LYSE<tab>よかった……また、誰かが倒れてしまうのかと……。
いったい、何が起きてるの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000940_ALISAIE<tab>I wish I knew. Nothing we've tried has brought us any closer to an answer...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000940_ALISAIE<tab>それが……いろいろ手を尽くしたけど、
まだ、わかっていないの……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000950_ALISAIE<tab>We'll keep working on it, but first we need to go and see Lord Hien.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000950_ALISAIE<tab>でも、いまはヒエンに報せを届ける方が先決。
ドマ町人地に急ぐわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000960_HIEN<tab>It seems the engineers have matters well in hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000960_HIEN<tab>ほう、準備は順調のようだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000970_HIEN<tab>Should the barrier work as we intend, Doma will be free to reinforce her allies in Ala Mhigo without fear of weakening her own borders.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000970_HIEN<tab>ここに防衛の壁を展開できれば、
我らドマも後顧の憂いなく、アラミゴに援軍を送れるというもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000980_HIEN<tab>Honored friends, the time has come to put your hard work to the test! Start the generator!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000980_HIEN<tab>よし、皆の者、聞いてくれ……！
これより「青龍壁」の起動実験を開始する！
起動準備、かかれ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000990_IRONWORKSENGINEER04500<tab>Node one is operational. Nodes two to eight are reporting similar energy levels. The barrier is forming!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_000990_IRONWORKSENGINEER04500<tab>一番基起動確認……防御フィールド、展開を開始しました！
二番から八番までの各基からも、同様の反応あり！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001000_IRONWORKSENGINEER04500<tab>...One thousand yalms. Two thousand. Three thousand. Expansion remains smooth. No fluctuations detected.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001000_IRONWORKSENGINEER04500<tab>1000……2000……3000……
防御フィールド、順調に展開を続けています……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001010_IRONWORKSENGINEER04500<tab>...Four thousand. Five thousand! Target altitude reached! The barrier is holding steady at five thousand yalms! We've done it!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001010_IRONWORKSENGINEER04500<tab>4000……5000……
やりました、目標高度5000ヤルムを達成！
「青龍壁」展開完了、飛空艇航路の封鎖に成功しました！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001020_ALISAIE<tab>...Is that an imperial airship? Of all the rotten timing...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001020_ALISAIE<tab>待って……帝国の小型艇……？
なんでまた、こんなときに限って……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001030_HIEN<tab>But this is a gift, Mistress Alisaie. They can test our new wall for us!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001030_HIEN<tab>いや、むしろ都合がよい。
我らが「青龍壁」の効果を確かめられるというもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001040_HIEN<tab>Seems solid enough. Though I was hoping for a fireball.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001040_HIEN<tab>どうやら、効果は抜群のようだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001050_ALISAIE<tab>By the gods... It's Alphinaud!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001050_ALISAIE<tab>あ、あれは……アルフィノ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001060_ALISAIE<tab>What are you─ Let me go! He has my brother!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001060_ALISAIE<tab>なんでッ！　放してよ……ッ！
アルフィノが……アルフィノがッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001070_HIEN<tab>Lower the barrier!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001070_HIEN<tab>「青龍壁」を一時解除……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001080_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>(-Shadowhunter-)Be at ease, girl. The lad is not dead─merely locked in slumber.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001080_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>(-影の狩人-)落ち着け、娘……。
この少年は、昏睡しているだけ……
死したわけではない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001090_ALISAIE<tab>No, not him too...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001090_ALISAIE<tab>そんな……！
それって、サンクレッドたちと同じ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001100_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>(-Shadowhunter-)We could identify no cause and found no remedy. Thus I sought to return him to Doma─and into the arms of Lord Hien himself, it would seem.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001100_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>(-影の狩人-)原因もわからず、手の施しようがないのでな。
ドマへ送り返さんとしたところで、その国主と出会おうとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001110_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>(-Shadowhunter-)It is a day for fated reunions...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001110_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>(-影の狩人-)なにより、うぬと再会するとは、何の因果か……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001120_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>(-Shadowhunter-)Would you not agree, adventurer? Or should I address you as the “Warrior of Light”?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001120_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>(-影の狩人-)久しいな、冒険者……
いや、エオルゼアの英雄「光の戦士」と呼ぶべきか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Gaius van Baelsar...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ガイウス……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Black Wolf...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>漆黒の王狼……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001130_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Aye. Gaius van Baelsar, the Black Wolf. That was the title I was given. One I have long since relinquished.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001130_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>(-影の狩人-)そう、我はかつて、漆黒の王狼と呼ばれた者……
ガイウス・ヴァン・バエサル。
いや、軍団長たる称号を失った、ただのガイウス・バエサルだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001140_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Stand down. The legatus of the XIVth Imperial Legion died in Castrum Meridianum. I am no more than Gaius Baelsar, a man without rank or allegiance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001140_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>ここで、剣を交える気はない。
第XIV軍団の軍団長は、あのとき死んだのだ。
いまや、階級はおろか国すら持たぬ、ひとりの男。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001150_ALISAIE<tab>Impossible! There's no way you could have survived!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001150_ALISAIE<tab>その元軍団長が、どうして……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001160_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Do you remember how it unfolded?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001160_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>うぬは覚えているであろう、魔導城での一件を……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001170_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>How I was deceived by Lahabrea? How I was convinced that reviving the Ultima Weapon would allow me to bring peace to Eorzea?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001170_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>我はエオルゼアに平定をもたらすため、
アシエン・ラハブレアの甘言に乗せられて、
古代アラグ帝国の対蛮神兵器、アルテマウェポンを再生した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001180_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>The Ascian used me, as he used so many others─all to further the restoration of his wretched god.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001180_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>しかし、それもすべては、
奴らの「真の神」とやらを復活させるための策略だったのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001190_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Yet even with the might of Allag at my command, you bested me. And as the Praetorium went up in flames, I was content to burn along with it...for a moment, at least.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001190_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>そのうえ、かの兵器をもってしても、
うぬに敗れた我は、もはや炎上する魔導城と、
運命をともにする覚悟だった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001200_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>A moment of folly. To surrender my life thus would have been to betray all who died for my cause. It was for them that I dragged myself free of the rubble, and swore vengeance on the Ascians.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001200_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>だが、我に忠義を尽くし、死んでいった者たちになんと詫びよう。
命惜しくなくとも、そのことが我を突き動かした。
この手で、アシエンどもを狩りつくしてやろう、とな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001210_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>The Black Wolf has shed his pelt, never to return to Garlemald or her legions. I live now only to exact revenge.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001210_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>漆黒の王狼は、その仮面とともに死んだ。
我は祖国に戻ることなく、復讐者として第二の生を得たのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001220_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>My principle quarry was to be Lahabrea, whom I gather you have since ushered unto oblivion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001220_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>我が仇敵、ラハブレアは、うぬが斃し滅せられたそうだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001230_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>But so many more remain. Long has their kind lurked in the shadows, laboring to sow chaos throughout our world. I would see each and every one dragged into the light and put to the sword.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001230_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>しかし、依然としてこの世界には奴らが蔓延っている。
世を混沌に陥れんとする存在は排除せねばならぬ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001240_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Are the Scions not of like mind?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001240_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>これは、「暁」の使命とも合致するのではないか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001250_ALISAIE<tab>In this single respect, perhaps...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001250_ALISAIE<tab>確かに、アシエンを倒すことに関しては……
私たちも志を同じくするわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001260_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Then I shall continue the partnership the boy began, and share what intelligence I have acquired.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001260_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>これも……かの少年が結んだ縁。
志が同じとあらば、こちらが知る情報を与えておこう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001270_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Among the Ascians, the black-masked ilk are subordinate to those who wear red. This, you already know.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001270_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>アシエンには、上位の赤き仮面の者らと、
それに従う下位の黒き仮面の者がいるのは知ってのとおり。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001280_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Yet among the red there exists a hierarchy. Those set adrift with the shards clearly stand below those still joined to the Source.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001280_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>しかし、赤き仮面の者たちの中にも階級があり、
「オリジナル」を名乗る少数の者らが、
「転生組」なる、その他の者を従えている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001290_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Nabriales, who once dared to intrude upon the Rising Stones, belonged to the former group. And while he was indeed a dangerous foe, his powers were inconsequential next to the Paragons of the Source.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001290_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>うぬら「暁」が始末したナプリアレスは、後者の転生組。
厄介なことは確かだが、問題は……
より強大な力を有する三体のオリジナルだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001300_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>The first was Lahabrea, who plagues us no more. There is also the white-robed Elidibus; and the elusive Emet-Selch, about whom little is known.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001300_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>そのうちの一体は既に消滅した「ラハブレア」。
残るは、白き衣の「エリディブス」……
そして、未だ謎に包まれている「エメトセルク」だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001310_ALISAIE<tab>We have files on Lahabrea and Elidibus, but I believe this “Emet-Selch” is new to us...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001310_ALISAIE<tab>ラハブレアに、エリディブス……報告で聞いた名だわ。
でも、エメトセルクは、初耳よね……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001320_ALISAIE<tab>As I assume my brother told you, we have evidence to suggest that an Ascian now walks in the body of the crown prince. Have you identified this interloper?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001320_ALISAIE<tab>私たちは、帝国内でアシエンが暗躍していると考えてるわ。
死んだはずの皇太子ゼノスの肉体を操る存在……
そいつについての情報は？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001330_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Elidibus seems the most likely culprit. As “emissary,” it is his role to maintain the equilibrium between Darkness and Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001330_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>我は、「エリディブス」だと睨んでいる。
調停者を名乗る奴は、光と闇の均衡を保つことを役目とする。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001340_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Your many deeds in Hydaelyn's name have upset the balance, and I believe he seeks to restore it by throwing his considerable power behind the Empire. As a leader of the Ascians, he is one of our primary targets.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001340_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>ハイデリンの使徒たる、うぬの働きで増した「光」の力……
それを削ごうと、帝国に力を貸しているに違いない。
始末すべき筆頭格といえよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001350_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>It was on the trail of this very prey that the boy and I came across the scene of a failed uprising. In the absence of a single Garlean casualty, we inspected the bodies of the rebels, and the lack of any external injury drew my immediate attention.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001350_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>そして、そのエリディブスの影を追って、
「暁」の少年と辺境の属州を探っていたときのことだ。
全滅した反帝国勢力の部隊に遭遇した……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001360_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>They had been slain by Black Rose─an alchemical invention of the imperial army. When I yet served as legatus, I ordered its production halted and all stockpiles destroyed. Toxic gas is not a tool of conquest, but of extermination.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001360_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>死因は「黒薔薇」……
過去に帝国軍が開発し、我が実戦投入を拒否して、
廃棄を命じた、忌まわしき毒ガス兵器だ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001370_ALISAIE<tab>Toxic gas!? This must be the new weapon Maxima warned us about─something deadly enough to sweep away all resistance in a matter of hours.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001370_ALISAIE<tab>毒ガス……！？
じゃあそれが、マキシマさんの言っていた新兵器……
反帝国勢力を一夜にして壊滅させたっていう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001380_ALISAIE<tab>Gods, you don't think they're planning to use this in Ala Mhigo, do you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001380_ALISAIE<tab>そんなものが、今度のアラミゴでの戦いで使われたら……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001390_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Put your fears to rest. We infiltrated the production facility, and destroyed all existing stores of the chemical along with the plant itself. Even should they rebuild the operation, they will not soon manufacture another batch.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001390_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>案ずるな、少年とともに精製工場に潜入し、
プラント共々、現存する「黒薔薇」はすべて破棄した。
いずれ再建されようが、しばらく投入されることはあるまい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001400_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Regardless, I would draw your attention to a directive we discovered in the plant's records. The document was marked with a recent date, and authorized with the signature of one Zenos yae Galvus.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001400_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>注目すべきは、工場内で発見された命令書だ。
その書類にはごく最近の日付と共に、署名が記されていた。
ゼノス・イェー・ガルヴァス、とな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001410_HIEN<tab>A dead man signing the death warrant for thousands. 'Tis bad comedy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001410_HIEN<tab>動く死体が、致死性の猛毒を造らせておったとは、
趣味の悪い話だ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001420_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>But the tale does not end there─within that same facility was a chamber filled with devices of Allagan design. Cloning technology, we realized.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001420_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>だが、工場で見たものはそれだけではない。
そこには、古代アラグ文明の技術である、
人造生命体の培養施設が存在した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001430_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>And what should we find in each and every incubator...but a young Emperor Solus.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001430_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>悪趣味さでいえば、そちらが上かもしれん。
ずらりと並んだ培養槽に入っていたのは、
初代ソル帝の若き姿をした、人造生命体だったのだからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001440_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>...All of which prompts the question: were the Ascians responsible for these abominations? Or was it the will of the Emperor?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001440_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>黒薔薇や人造生命体の生成が、
アシエンによって進められたことなのか、
それとも皇帝陛下の意志によるものなのか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001450_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>I must know which hand guides the Empire. Though I have given up my rank, I am yet a son of Garlemald...and I will fight for the future of my homeland.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001450_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>我はそれを見定めねばならぬ。
階級を捨てたとて、我はガレアン族……
祖国を憂う気持ちに、一切の変わりはない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001460_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>It is time I returned to the hunting of shadows. We should focus on our common foe─to reopen old quarrels now would serve no purpose.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001460_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>ゆえに我は、ふたたびアシエンの影を追わねばならん。
冒険者よ、討つべき共通の敵がいる以上、
我らが争うのは得策ではない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001470_ALISAIE<tab>You saved my brother's life, so I'm willing to let sleeping dogs lie. But in truth, it's not my decision to make.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001470_ALISAIE<tab>私にとっては……あなたは兄の窮地を救ってくれた恩人だわ。
でも、決めるのは私じゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're right. There are more important matters at hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>今は争っている場合じゃない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We'll settle this another time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>結論はいずれ出そう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001480_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>There was a time when I scorned those who placed their faith in false gods─even as I, in my blinkered conviction, placed mine in Ascian promises.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001480_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>かたじけない……。
かつて、我は偽りの神に縋る弱き者を否定した。
だが、己もアシエンの偽りに縋り、強者を装っていたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001490_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Unlike yours, my strength of will─and my restraint─was found wanting. We shall meet again, Warrior of Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001490_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>我もまた……弱かったということ……。
また会おう、真に強き光の戦士よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001500_HIEN<tab>So that was the infamous Black Wolf. An unexpected ally, to say the least...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001500_HIEN<tab>あれが、漆黒の王狼と謳われたガイウスか……。
ひとかどの武人であると聞いていたが、
思わぬ展開になってきたものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001510_HIEN<tab>Well, I am content to leave the fine-tuning of the barrier to cleverer minds. Let us bid our friends from the Ironworks farewell and see what can be done for Alphinaud back in Doma.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001510_HIEN<tab>ともかく、アルフィノの容態も気になるところ。
「青龍壁」の最終調整は、技術者たちに任せて、
ドマへと戻るとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001520_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, at the Black Rose chemical plant...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001520_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>一方 ガレマール帝国・黒薔薇工場――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001530_IMPERIALENGINEER<tab>Our supplies of Black Rose have been ruined, but the new plant is already under construction. We should have the first batch ready in time for the offensive, Your Radiance!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001530_IMPERIALENGINEER<tab>備蓄されていた「黒薔薇」は失われましたが、
現在、新規のプラントを構築中であります！
次期遠征には必ず……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001540_VARIS<tab>See that you do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001540_VARIS<tab>……急がせよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001550_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>Ah, yes! The infamous “Black Rose.” If I recall correctly, Gaius did not much care for the invention.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001550_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>ははぁ、「黒薔薇」か……。
覚えているぞ、漆黒の王狼が破棄させた毒ガス兵器だったな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001560_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>A ruthless and indiscriminate weapon indeed, this airborne poison. It seems you <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> capable of making decisions worthy of your bloodline.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001560_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>いいぞ、実に効率的だ。
たまには私の血縁らしい選択もできるじゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001570_VARIS<tab>With no gift for sorcery, we Garleans must look to magitek to even the odds. If it spares the needless deaths of our soldiers, and serves the cause of this empire, there is no method I would not employ.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001570_VARIS<tab>……先天的に魔法が使えぬ我らにとって、魔導技術こそが力。
無駄に兵を死なせぬため、帝国と世界のため、
使わぬ手はない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001580_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>How very noble of you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001580_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>はいはい……。
実に小さい世界の話で、厭になるな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001590_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>Truly, though, I must commend you for embracing your role as emperor. You play the part of the determined ruler well. Sometimes, even <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> catch myself believing!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001590_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>だが、そういうもっともらしい理由をつけられるのは、
皇帝としては高評価だ。
引き続きがんばりたまえよ、我が孫ヴァリスくん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001600_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>A silent agent of death... Now that I think on it, Black Rose may well possess the perfect aspect.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001600_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>それにしても、毒の兵器……
ふむ、「静かなる死をもたらすもの」か……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001610_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>Slowly but surely, the deluge of Light has worked upon the aether here in the Source, and the gas should be most susceptible to its influence...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001610_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>あちら側で「光の氾濫」が起きて以来、
こちら側にも、いい具合に影響が出始めているからな……。
相乗効果で、化ける可能性はあるか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001620_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>Well, I shall leave you to your own devices. Go forth and bloody the land with your grand and glorious war.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001620_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>よし、こちらはお前に任せた。
大いに伸び伸びと戦争をしてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001630_VARIS<tab>...While you do what, precisely?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001630_VARIS<tab>……どこへ行くつもりだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001640_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>Need you ask? I will be doing what all Ascians do.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001640_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>アシエンにそれを聞くか？
答えはひとつだろうに。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001650_VARIS<tab>I am well aware that your kind exists only to usher in the next calamity. But you seem oblivious to the harm your singular agenda causes to the Empire.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001650_VARIS<tab>貴様らが霊災を起こすために動いていることなど、百も承知だ。
私はただ、貴様の勝手な行動が、
結果としてこの国のしがらみになっていると言いたいのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001660_VARIS<tab>You cannot have forgotten the events which followed your mortal demise.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001660_VARIS<tab>先の崩御……
貴様の当時の肉体が死を迎えたときのことを、
忘れたとはいわせぬぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001670_VARIS<tab>Our homeland was plunged into civil war for your failure to name a successor. The edifice you so carefully constructed was but a hair's breadth from collapse!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001670_VARIS<tab>貴様が後継者を指名せずに死んだおかげで、
この国は内乱状態となった。
あわや崩壊の危機に陥ったのだぞ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001680_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>Are you truly so naive?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001680_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>ああ……これだから厭だ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001690_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>You thought me oblivious to the consequences? Of a departure so painstakingly timed?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001690_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>あれが私の不注意だとでも？
あんな、七面倒な退場の仕方が？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001700_VARIS<tab>...It was by <var 1A 02 /var>design<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001700_VARIS<tab>では、貴様……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001710_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>Well, of course it was! Though I will admit the resulting panic exceeded even my wildest expectations. But how can you be surprised? Throwing the world into disarray was the very purpose for which this nation was, as you say, “so carefully constructed.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001710_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>そうだ、おかげでいい感じに混乱しただろう！
もともと人の世を引っ掻き回すために造った国なんだ、
役立って何よりだよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001720_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>Now, if you have no further questions, I must be on my way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001720_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>質問は済んだようだな。
それでは、私は出かけるぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001730_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>Since we may not meet again in this lifetime, it would be remiss of me not to offer a word or two of gratitude.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001730_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>……そうだ、場合によっては、今生の別れになるかもしれん。
ひとつくらいは、礼を言っておこう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001740_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>I really must thank you for this surplus of vessels. I can mold any host into my own image, but having bodies tailor-made for me in this fashion is so much less tiresome!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001740_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>この体を量産してくれて、助かった。
私はどの体に憑いても、それを「自分」にできるんだが……
もともとそう造ってある体なら、調整の手間がなくていい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001750_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>You dabbled in Allagan cloning techniques, yes? It certainly is a compelling─not to mention entertaining─field of research.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001750_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>アラグ帝国の生体複製技術を試したんだったか？
確かにあれは、なかなか滑稽で見所のある研究だったな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001760_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>And of all the options available, you chose the founding father on whom to experiment! You have a twisted streak to you, Varis. Like grandsire, like grandson, eh?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001760_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>実験体に、あえて国父ソルを選ぶとは！
いやぁ、なかなかに歪んでいる……さすがは我が孫だ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001770_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>If events play out as planned, this will become something of a family enterprise.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001770_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>ではな。
互いにうまくやれば、家族の共同作業になるぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001780_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>You will be the capstone of this world; I, the anchor in the shard. And together, we will give the lie to this star's fraudulent existence!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001780_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>お前は、この地の杭に。
私は、虚ろなる世界の杭に。
この星の欺瞞を、ともに砕こうじゃあないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001790_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>Hm hm hm...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001790_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>ククク……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001791_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>Hah hah...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001791_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>ハハ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001792_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>Ahahahaha!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001792_SOLUSZOSGALVUS<tab>アハハハハ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001800_LYSE<tab>Welcome back, you two. Greetings, Lord Hien! Glad you could join us!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001800_LYSE<tab>ふたりとも、ありがとう。
ヒエンもいっしょに来てくれたんだね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001810_HIEN<tab>Glad to be here. I would have come sooner, were our own defenses not in question. But I am pleased to report that our soldiers are assembling for deployment to Ala Mhigo as we speak.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001810_HIEN<tab>東方地域の防備に、目途がついたのでな。
アラミゴへの援軍についても、準備を開始しておる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001820_RAUBAHN<tab>We are grateful for your support. Thanks to the efforts of our allies, it won't be long before we've established defensive positions on this front as well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001820_RAUBAHN<tab>……ありがたい。
こちらの防衛陣地についても、
同盟各国の協力で準備が進んでいるところだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001830_ALISAIE<tab>Ahem, we have some good news too... Alphinaud has come back to us. As for the bad news...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001830_ALISAIE<tab>それと、実はアルフィノが帰ってきたんだけど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001840_LYSE<tab>So, Alphinaud won't wake up, Gaius van Baelsar is alive and hunting Ascians, and the Empire is planning to poison us all with toxic gas. Does that sound about right?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001840_LYSE<tab>アルフィノの昏倒に、アシエンを狩るガイウス……
それに毒ガス兵器……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001850_LYSE<tab>Ordinarily, any one of those things would have left me in shock, but the way things have been lately, it's all starting to seem pretty normal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001850_LYSE<tab>こんな状況じゃなければ、
ひとつひとつに驚いているところだけど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001860_LYSE<tab>Getting back to your report, are we sure this “Black Rose” is the weapon Maxima was talking about?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001860_LYSE<tab>でもさ、その「黒薔薇」ってマキシマさんが言っていた、
新兵器のことだよね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001870_RAUBAHN<tab>It fits the description. And it seems we have Alphinaud to thank for sparing us an early demonstration of its effectiveness. I've a feeling this won't be the last time his bravery in the Empire will serve us here in Eorzea.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001870_RAUBAHN<tab>ああ、そう考えていいだろう。
アルフィノ殿のおかげで、最悪の事態を免れたのかもしれん。
単身で帝国へ向かった勇気と行動力には、感服せざるをえんな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001880_RAUBAHN<tab>The threat of an unknown weapon has had us all on edge... But now that we know what we're dealing with, we can take steps to defend against it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001880_RAUBAHN<tab>正体不明の新兵器という情報に、不安ばかりが募っていたが、
その存在が毒ガスであるとわかれば、予めできることはある。
至急、対応策の検討に入るとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001890_RAUBAHN<tab>As for Gaius...I'm not sure what to think. Am I happy he's alive? Not in the slightest. Am I happy he's hunting Ascians? Aye. I'd have to say I am.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001890_RAUBAHN<tab>それにしても、あのガイウスが生きていたとはな。
アシエンと敵対しているという話も驚きだが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001900_LYSE<tab>Oh, speaking of Garleans-you-didn't-expect-to-see, we have a tale of our own, as it happens. When we sent envoys to the imperial army to request talks, they returned with the message that “Varis zos Galvus” would be attending.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001900_LYSE<tab>驚きの報せといえば、こっちにもあるんだった。
進軍してきた帝国軍に停戦交渉を持ちかけたんだけど、
ヴァリス自ら会談に応じると、返答があって……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001910_HIEN<tab>The Emperor himself? Well, Varis did sanction the Populares' peace mission...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001910_HIEN<tab>ヴァリス帝か……。
先のドマへの和平交渉も、
もともとは、かの君が提言してくれたのだったな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001920_HIEN<tab>...But knowing that an Ascian walks in his son's skin, I do not see how we can trust him or anyone from that nest of vipers.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001920_HIEN<tab>とはいえ、ゼノスの正体がアシエンである可能性が高い以上、
どの道を通ろうとも、蛇の道は蛇、かもな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001930_RAUBAHN<tab>The Alliance would proceed with negotiations regardless, if only to give ourselves more time to prepare. We do, however, require your cooperation...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001930_RAUBAHN<tab>ああ、だが、エオルゼア同盟軍としては、
時間稼ぎとしても、この会談を実現したい。
が……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001940_LYSE<tab>Ah, right, yes... So...as a condition for the talks to go forward, the Empire has requested that a member of the Scions be present. There'll be a representative from each Alliance nation, of course, but I'm afraid we have to ask that you come along too.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001940_LYSE<tab>先方が交渉に応じる条件として、
各国の代表に加え、「暁」からも出席者を求めてきているんだ。
……強制することはできないけど、お願いできないかな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001950_ALISAIE<tab>Gods, Lyse...you know how much I hate politics. But then what choice do I have? Alphinaud and the others aren't going to do it...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001950_ALISAIE<tab>アルフィノが出られない以上、
政治が苦手だなんて言ってられないわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001960_ALISAIE<tab>Very well. I shall attend as the Scions' representative.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001960_ALISAIE<tab>わかったわ、私が「暁」の代表として出席する。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001970_LYSE<tab>In case you're wondering why I didn't ask you, the Empire also requested the presence of “Eorzea's champion”...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001970_LYSE<tab>そして、帝国は「エオルゼアの英雄」である、
あなたの出席も求めてきたの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll be there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>出席しよう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm not fond of politics either...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>自分も政治は……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001980_LYSE<tab>That's settled, then. We don't know what Varis means to bring to the table, or why he wants you there, but having you close at hand will make all the difference.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001980_LYSE<tab>よかった……。
先方にどんな意図があるのかわからないけど、
こちらとしては、あなたがいてくれるだけで心強いからね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001990_LYSE<tab>Oh, you're not, are you? Come on. If Alisaie can put on a brave face, then so can you. Now, we don't know what Varis means to bring to the table, or why he wants you there, but having you close at hand should make all the difference.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_001990_LYSE<tab>そ、そんなこと言わず、お願いだから出席して……。
先方にどんな意図があるのかわからないけど、
こちらとしては、あなたがいてくれるだけで心強いんだよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002000_RAUBAHN<tab>The meeting will take place on the border. Anticipating an early assault, we mean to position the bulk of our forces nearby.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002000_RAUBAHN<tab>もちろん、帝国が不意打ちを狙ってくることも考えて、
会談の場となる国境地帯には、全軍を差し向ける予定だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002010_LYSE<tab>The Alliance leaders should already be on their way. Once you're ready, we can head out and join them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002010_LYSE<tab>各国の盟主たちも、すでに向かってくれている。
私たちも、あなたの準備ができ次第、出発しましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002020_VARIS<tab>Esteemed representatives of the Eorzean Alliance─on behalf of the Garlean Empire, I thank you for inviting me here today.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002020_VARIS<tab>エオルゼアの盟主たちよ。
我こそ、ガレマール帝国第二代皇帝、
ヴァリス・ゾス・ガルヴァスである。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002030_VARIS<tab>As this parley was convened at your request, I invite you to speak first.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002030_VARIS<tab>まずは聞かせてもらおうか、
停戦を訴える貴公らの言い分を……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002040_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Very well, Your Radiance. I, Nanamo Ul Namo, seventeenth in the line of Ul, should be pleased to oblige you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002040_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>それでは、わらわ、
ウルダハ第十七代国王、ナナモ・ウル・ナモより、
エオルゼア都市軍事同盟の総意を伝えよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002050_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>As recent events in Ala Mhigo and Doma have made plain, the subjugation and exploitation of neighboring nations is not a sustainable policy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002050_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>貴国、ガレマール帝国の力による支配は、
一時は成功しようとも、必ずや綻びが生じることは明白……
アラミゴ、ドマでの戦はその証左であった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002060_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Should this day end in war, you may very well defeat us, but you will never extinguish the people's desire for freedom. Though it may not be in our lifetime, there will be another revolution, another war, and the cycle will continue.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002060_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>我らはたとえ、此度の戦に敗れたとて、
幾世代にもかけて、自由を求め戦い続けるであろう。
この終わりなき負の連鎖は、ここで断ち切らねばならぬ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002070_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Doma has entered into a concord with the nations of Eorzea. A partnership wherein we recognize one another as equals.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002070_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>そして、我らエオルゼア諸国、並びにドマ国は、
各々が独立を保ちながらも、確かな同盟関係を結んでいる。
そなたらガレアン人国家とも、平和裏に手を取ることができるはず。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002080_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Garlemald could be afforded similar treatment. You need only set aside your ambitions and join us in paving a path towards peace.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002080_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>いまこそ、旧怨と支配欲とを捨て去り、
共生の道を模索しようではないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002090_VARIS<tab>Hmph! You will not win me over with sophistry, Your Grace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002090_VARIS<tab>フン……詭弁だな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002100_VARIS<tab>As you know only too well, this <var 1A 02 /var>alliance<var 1A 01 /var> lacks the strength to keep the peace within its own borders. Even now, your struggles with the beastmen continue unabated.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002100_VARIS<tab>いまでこそ同盟関係にあるのやもしれんが、
エオルゼアとて、かつては国同士の戦争や内乱が絶えなかった。
さらに言えば、今なお「蛮族」との争いを続けておる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002110_VARIS<tab>Divided, you sow this fertile soil with the seeds of your differences and reap naught but discord and chaos for your trouble. Eorzea must be united under one leader, one purpose. I would offer you both and bring an end to your strife.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002110_VARIS<tab>断言するが、国が分かたれていれば、争いの種は尽きることはない。
すべての民が、ひとつ理想の下に集わぬかぎり、
終わりなき負の連鎖とやらは、断ち切れはせぬというものよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002120_LYSE<tab>With all due respect, Your Radiance, the only thing that you offered the people of Ala Mhigo was fear and hopelessness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002120_LYSE<tab>お言葉だけど……帝国に支配されたアラミゴでは、
属州民は自由を奪われ虐げられ、恐怖と絶望の下で生きていた。
それが、帝国の掲げる理想というものなの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002130_HIEN<tab>The citizens of Doma can also attest to the meager alms of imperial rule. There is no purpose to be found in a life of oppression, each day more uncertain than the last.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002130_HIEN<tab>ドマも同じだ……。
支配された民は圧政に怯え、
明日をも知れぬ身に、皆、震えていた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002140_LYSE<tab>Our people are willing to die for their freedom. A great many already have. And countless more will, if we don't put an end to this madness here and now.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002140_LYSE<tab>結果、自由を求めて戦が起こり、多大な犠牲が出ることになった。
帝国のやり方は、悲惨な争いを生むだけなんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002150_VARIS<tab>We brought order and stability to your lives. This madness and bloodshed is of your own making. You broke the peace, not Garlemald.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002150_VARIS<tab>統治者に逆らい争いを起こしたのはそちら。
圧政を敷かざるをえんのも、反逆者が絶えぬため。
従っていれば、平和は約束されていたものを……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002160_RAUBAHN<tab>Peace? Order? You kill our peoples, despoil our lands, take everything that is ours. And what? You expect us to lick the boot that grinds our faces into the dirt?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002160_RAUBAHN<tab>仲間を殺され、祖国を蹂躙され、
すべてを奪われた者たちが、大人しく従うことはない。
反旗を翻すのも当然のことではないか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002170_VARIS<tab>I expect you to weigh the costs. To recognize that countless lives have been lost on both sides in pursuit of a greater good─and to not squander all we have achieved in a fit of petulance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002170_VARIS<tab>その反逆によって出たこちらの犠牲も、決して少なくはない。
戦死した兵らにも、それぞれの人生があったのだ。
尊い犠牲を無駄にせぬためにも、歩みを止めるわけにはいかん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002180_AYMERIC<tab>Your Radiance, I fear I can personally attest to the dangers of pursuing one's vision with such righteous fervor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002180_AYMERIC<tab>では、私から少し話をさせていただこう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002190_AYMERIC<tab>For a thousand years, the Holy See of Ishgard waged war with dragons.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002190_AYMERIC<tab>我が国、イシュガルドは、
千年にわたってドラゴン族と戦ってきた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002200_AYMERIC<tab>A thousand years of sacrifice, of sorrow and hate, in which we bathed in the blood of friend and foe alike. Had it gone on any longer, we may well have drowned.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002200_AYMERIC<tab>双方とも犠牲の山はうず高く積まれるばかり、
戦はどちらかが滅びるまで続くものと思われた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002210_AYMERIC<tab>Yet we have chosen to raise ourselves out of this bloody spiral, and have since made peace with our former enemy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002210_AYMERIC<tab>しかし、我々とドラゴン族は千年の禍根を乗り越え、
竜詩戦争を終結させ、融和の道を歩み始めたのだ。
貴国との間にも、必ずや和平の可能性があるはず……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002220_VARIS<tab>So I understand. No doubt the dragons were more receptive to your overtures in the wake of their leader's demise.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002220_VARIS<tab>その融和とやらも、竜の頭目……
かの邪竜を殺すことでのみ、成し遂げたと聞くが？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002230_VARIS<tab>You speak of peace, yet use war to achieve it. Your father would not have bothered to obscure his intent with honeyed words. He understood that strength is all that matters in the end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002230_VARIS<tab>私は、美辞麗句を語る貴様より、
強大な力によって、すべての者を統べようとした、
先の教皇にこそ、共感を覚えるのだがな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002240_VARIS<tab>Without his clarity of vision, I can but wonder what will become of Ishgard and her people.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002240_VARIS<tab>まったく話にならぬな……。
そもそも、「己の国」とやらの定義は何なのだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002250_VARIS<tab>There was a time when Garlemald too lacked a leader of conviction. Weak and unable to wield magic, we were at the mercy of the strong, from whom we sought refuge in the bitter cold of the north.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002250_VARIS<tab>ガレアン族は、故郷を追われた民である。
先天的に魔法が使えぬ我らは、領土争いに敗れ、
北方の寒冷地に追いやられた歴史を持つ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002260_VARIS<tab>Were it not for the discovery of ceruleum, and the subsequent development of magitek, we might never have gained the power to take back that which was rightfully ours.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002260_VARIS<tab>そこで青燐水を発見し、魔導技術を得たからこそ、
領土を取り戻し、強国へ成長することもできたが……
それまでは厳しい生活の中、苦汁をなめてきたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002270_MERLWYB<tab>You speak as if your people were the first to have been driven from their homes. Limsa Lominsa was built by wayward souls in search of a place to call their own.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002270_MERLWYB<tab>我らリムサ・ロミンサの民も、同じく故郷を追われた身だ。
それでも、新天地を切り開いて海の都を築き上げた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002280_MERLWYB<tab>On the shores of Vylbrand we found it, and from those humble beginnings did we grow and flourish. And all without robbing our neighbors of their liberty.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002280_MERLWYB<tab>だが、必要以上の拡大はせぬ。
不遇な境遇だからとて、侵略が肯定されるわけではない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002290_VARIS<tab>So sayeth the pirate. Am I to believe that you simply asked the kobolds to yield up their lands, and that they were happy to oblige you? That you did not drive them out like rats in the hold of one of the many ships seized by your “privateers”?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002290_VARIS<tab>さすがは海賊、略奪が日常ゆえに忘れてしまったか？
バイルブランド島を、先住民のコボルド族から奪ったことを……。
もっとも、蛮族を駆逐するとは、よい心掛けだがな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002300_VARIS<tab>I will concede that, after centuries of exile, reclamation may be mistaken for invasion. Nevertheless, it is not─and those who till stolen soil have no right to object when cast out in turn.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002300_VARIS<tab>ガレアン族が故郷を取り戻すまでの数百年間で、
その土地に根付いた民にとってみれば、我らは所詮、侵略者。
相互理解などという、生ぬるいもので共存できようはずもない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002310_KANESENNA<tab>Your uncompromising nature rivals that of the Ixal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002310_KANESENNA<tab>まるで……行き場がないと嘆き、黒衣森の恵みを奪うことで、
精霊の心を乱す、イクサル族のようです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002320_KANESENNA<tab>They too lament circumstances which they themselves perpetuate. Were they but to embrace peace, we would welcome them with open arms. Indeed, some few have done just that, and now receive of the Twelveswood's bounty.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002320_KANESENNA<tab>しかし、そんなイクサル族のなかにも、
己の拠り所をみつけ充足を得た者たちもいます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002330_KANESENNA<tab>Would that your people might learn from their example.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002330_KANESENNA<tab>ガレマール帝国にも、拡大路線だけでなく、
民の幸福を実現する、ほかの道があるのではないでしょうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002340_VARIS<tab>[LAUGHTER]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002340_VARIS<tab>クククク……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002350_VARIS<tab>You would dare compare us to the birdmen? You who thought to invoke the Twelve and threaten all of creation?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002350_VARIS<tab>まさか、我らが蛮族に喩えられようとはな……。
容易く神に救いを求めるそちらこそ、世界の脅威だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002360_VARIS<tab>I came here in the hope of finding some speck of common ground, but I see now these discussions will accomplish nothing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002360_VARIS<tab>少しでも停戦の可能性があればと、会談の申し出を受けたものの、
このままでは、埒が明かぬな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002370_VARIS<tab>Despite what you people may believe, I am not wont to choose the sword over the olive branch. 'Tis but a pity men are loath to accept one without first being shown the other.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002370_VARIS<tab>こちらとて、無駄な血は流したくないのだが、
やはり、武力で語り合うしかないということか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002380_ALISAIE<tab>Wait, I beg you! This meeting was supposed to be a chance to find a way forward together, not to bemoan the missteps which brought us here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002380_ALISAIE<tab>待って……！
せっかく、敵対し続けてきた者同士が、
会談の場を持てたのだから、もう少し話し合いましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002390_ALISAIE<tab>Please─if you truly consider violence a last resort, there must be a way we can come to an agreement.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002390_ALISAIE<tab>お互い戦いを望んでいないのなら、
過去の非をあげつらうのでなく、停戦に向けて歩み寄るべきよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002400_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>As Mistress Alisaie says, we did not come here to bicker over the past, but to discuss how we might strive towards a brighter future.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002400_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>確かに……その通りじゃ。
この会談は、お互いの未来に向けて話し合うはずであった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002410_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Emperor Varis, may I suggest a short recess, that all present might compose themselves prior to beginning anew?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002410_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>ヴァリス殿、議論がもつれてしまったいま、
休憩を挟んで、皆で頭を冷やしてから、改めて話し合わぬか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002420_VARIS<tab>Very well. I pray this intermission will suffice to move these talks in a more constructive direction.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002420_VARIS<tab>……よかろう。
一服の後に、建設的な話ができることを期待しているぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002430_VARIS<tab>Now then. Who would have the floor?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002430_VARIS<tab>さて、会談を再開するとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002440_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Before we resume, I wish to offer you an apology. After you graciously accepted our invitation to discuss an armistice, we have done naught but rebuke you at every opportunity. I believe I speak for all of us when I say we are deeply sorry for our discourtesy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002440_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>本題に入る前に、まずは感謝を……
先程はこちらの主張を述べるばかりになってしまったが、
会談に応じてくれたこと、礼を伝えるべきであった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002450_MERLWYB<tab>I'll admit, your familiarity with our affairs surprised me─and served to remind me how little I know of yours.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002450_MERLWYB<tab>率直に言って、そちらがエオルゼア諸国の歴史や文化を、
深く知っていることに驚いた。
対して、我らは帝国の事情に通じているとは言い難い。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002460_RAUBAHN<tab>I think all here can understand the desire to reclaim one's homeland. But why expand further─that is my question.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002460_RAUBAHN<tab>寒冷地に追いやられたガレアン族が、
魔導技術を得た後、かつての故郷に戻ろうとしたのはわかる。
だが、その後も領土拡大を続けたのはなぜだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002470_HIEN<tab>If I may─the answer can be found in the imperial doctrine they took great pains to impart to my people.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002470_HIEN<tab>わしは、幼き頃より帝国式の教育を受けてきた。
そこで教えられた歴史は、こうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002480_HIEN<tab>Recognizing the threat eikons pose to the world, Solus zos Galvus decreed that they were to be eradicated. To this end, he began a campaign to unite all lands under the Garlean banner.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002480_HIEN<tab>蛮神の脅威を知った初代ソル帝は、
世界を救うべく、その討滅を国是に掲げた。
そして、全土統一に向けて動き始めたのだ……と。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002490_HIEN<tab>Or so we were taught. Yet the Emperor only reached the Burn─the barrens said to have been laid waste by eikons─after conquering all the lands that lay between. What is more, I am quite certain the practice of summoning was not nearly so widespread in the days before the Empire's founding.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002490_HIEN<tab>が、帝国の拡大は、ザ・バーンの荒廃を見る以前からのもの。
さらに言えば、近年の神降ろしは、いずれも帝国成立後に、
行われている……これでは辻褄が合わん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002500_LYSE<tab>When you put it like that, it all starts to sound like an excuse, doesn't it? But to distract from what? Why are you really waging this war?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002500_LYSE<tab>あなたは……帝国はいったい何を求めているの？
戦いを避けたいと言いながらも、侵略を続ける真意を、
どうか聞かせてちょうだい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002510_VARIS<tab>...Finally, you ask the right question.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002510_VARIS<tab>……よくぞ言った。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002520_VARIS<tab>I can but hope you heed mine answer and at last accept the righteousness of our cause.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002520_VARIS<tab>こちらも真意を語ることで、我が理想への道に、
エオルゼア諸国が加わるというのなら、大いに歓迎しよう。
繰り返すが、戦いを望んでいるわけではないのだからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002530_VARIS<tab>My goal is this: to return the world to the way it once was. The way it was always meant to be.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002530_VARIS<tab>私が築かんとする理想の世界とは……
すなわち、本来のあるべき世界だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002540_VARIS<tab>In doing so, mankind will be made whole once more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002540_VARIS<tab>それは同時に、
我々人類が、本来のあるべき姿に戻る道でもある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002550_VARIS<tab>No longer will we suffer from the dissension born of our differences.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002550_VARIS<tab>我々は、それぞれの種族に、長所と短所を併せ持つ。
つまり、みな不完全だ……なぜか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002560_VARIS<tab>There will be but one race─a perfect race─as we were when time began.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002560_VARIS<tab>それは、始原の時代……
「ひとつの民」だったものが、分かたれたため。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002570_LYSE<tab>What in Rhalgr's name are you talking about?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002570_LYSE<tab>い、いったい、何の話をしているの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002580_VARIS<tab>I am talking about the origins of this star. Of the Source, and its thirteen reflections.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002580_VARIS<tab>有史以前に、世界が複数に分断されたことは知っていよう。
原初世界と、13の鏡像世界にな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002590_VARIS<tab>At the instant of the great sundering, 'twas not only the world that was shattered, but mankind itself. Thus were we divided into myriad races, each with its own unique imperfections.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002590_VARIS<tab>この「世界分断」とともに、
我ら人類もまた分かたれたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002600_VARIS<tab>That is why man looks upon his neighbor and feels fear and hatred. Why he wages war. Why he kills his brother.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002600_VARIS<tab>人の争いが、永劫無限に終わらぬのも、それゆえだ。
不完全ゆえに他者を妬み……
狭き視野で正義を定め、戦い、奪い合うのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002610_VARIS<tab>You all in your own way have proven as much today. The peace you seek is but a fleeting solution to a fundamental problem. One which calls for more drastic measures.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002610_VARIS<tab>貴公らの、先の主張も同じこと。
いかに聞こえが良くとも、一時の解決にしかならぬ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002620_VARIS<tab>To bring about everlasting peace, our worlds must be rejoined.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002620_VARIS<tab>よいか……
本当の平穏のために目指すべきは、世界の統合。
それによって真なる人になることだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002630_VARIS<tab>That is the goal the Empire would see realized─the glorious future unto which we shall one day shepherd mankind.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002630_VARIS<tab>その大願の成就に向けて、我らは突き進む！
万難を排し、力を取り込んで、人の明日を目指すのだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002640_MERLWYB<tab>A rejoining of worlds...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002640_MERLWYB<tab>世界の……統合……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002650_KANESENNA<tab>I have heard this tale of the Source and its reflections before...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002650_KANESENNA<tab>「暁」からそのような報告はいただいてます。
しかし、しかしそれは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002660_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Are these not the selfsame desires as the Ascians?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002660_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>ああ、アシエンたちの宿願と同じではないか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002670_AYMERIC<tab>Emperor Varis! Do not trust in their words. They will lead you to your doom.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002670_AYMERIC<tab>ヴァリス帝よ、失礼を承知で申し上げる。
貴殿もアシエンの口車に乗せられているのではないか！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002680_AYMERIC<tab>My father thought to use them, but in the end he succumbed to their temptations. He embraced summoning like so many other pawns before him. Do not tell us you mean to do the same!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002680_AYMERIC<tab>我が父もまた、彼らを利用するつもりでいて、
結局は神降ろしに手を染めた……それと同じことでは！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002690_VARIS<tab>[LAUGHTER]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002690_VARIS<tab>クックックックッ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002700_VARIS<tab>To be a pawn, free from the burden of choice, would be a blessing...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002700_VARIS<tab>操られてなどいるものか。
そうであったなら、どれほどよかったかとすら思うぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002710_VARIS<tab>But I foreswore that privilege the day I learned that the Garlean Empire was built by the hand of an Ascian.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002710_VARIS<tab>そもそも、ガレマール帝国とは、
アシエンが興した国家なのだからな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002720_ALISAIE<tab>What!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002720_ALISAIE<tab>な、なんですって……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002730_VARIS<tab>Yes. My grandsire, the former emperor, is of their number. And who better to build an empire capable of bringing about the calamitous change we desire?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002730_VARIS<tab>建国の父である、初代ソル帝の正体こそアシエン。
人の歴史に介入しやすくするために打ち立てた強き国が、
我がガレマール帝国だったのだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002740_VARIS<tab>Would you condemn me for this alliance, for bowing to the will of these shadowy masters, when the prize is true and lasting peace?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002740_VARIS<tab>どうだ……？
異形の者どもに踊らされてきたガレアン族を哀れと嗤うか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Your prize is a lie. Your masters, demons.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>アシエンと戦わないのか！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I will stop you and the Ascians. No matter the cost.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>ともにアシエンを討とう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002750_VARIS<tab>I come not to conquer, but to liberate─to free man from the prison of divergence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002750_VARIS<tab>闇雲に戦うのでもなく、踊らされるのでもなく、我は我が道を征く。
世界の再統合までは、アシエンに協力もしてみせよう。
が、それを成したとき……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002760_VARIS<tab>Imagine a world united. One perfect race beneath a single standard.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002760_VARIS<tab>ひとつの完璧な生命となった、真なる人による国家を創る！
ガレマールという旗印のもとに！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002770_VARIS<tab>An army before whose might these servants of Darkness and Light would fly as leaves in a storm, never again to meddle in man's affairs.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002770_VARIS<tab>そして、あるべき完全な姿となった全人類の力を糾合し、
闇の使徒も、光の使徒も……
人に干渉せんとする異形をすべて倒す！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002780_VARIS<tab>We would be the masters of our own fate!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002780_VARIS<tab>人が人として、自らの生を決める、
あるべき世界を人類にもたらすために！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002790_VARIS<tab>I bid you join me! Not as subjects of Garlemald, but of a new nation! And together we shall win freedom for ourselves and generations yet unborn!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002790_VARIS<tab>さあ、いまこそ我らガレマール帝国……
いや、未来の統一人類国家に加わるのだ！
我らが子らに、真なる自由を届けるためにッ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002800_LYSE<tab>You want to trigger another half-dozen calamities? You can't be serious!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002800_LYSE<tab>し、正気の沙汰じゃない！
霊災が起きるたび、いったいどれほどの犠牲がでるというの！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002810_RAUBAHN<tab>Have you forgotten how many died? There will be no one left!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002810_RAUBAHN<tab>そうだ！
我々は第七霊災で多くの民と仲間を失ったのだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002820_MERLWYB<tab>Do you truly imagine we would aid you in your bloodletting?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002820_MERLWYB<tab>あのような犠牲を、もう二度と出してなるものか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002830_KANESENNA<tab>It is unthinkable! Unconscionable!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002830_KANESENNA<tab>悲劇を繰り返すなど、断じてあってはなりません！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002840_VARIS<tab>And what is the alternative? To be as cattle waiting for slaughter. I would have us work together, that we might take fate into our own hands.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002840_VARIS<tab>犠牲……だと？
このままでは、アシエンの家畜のまま……
たとえ百万、千万の命が失われようとも進み続けるのみよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002850_ALISAIE<tab>Into <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> hands, perhaps...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002850_ALISAIE<tab>それだけじゃない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002860_ALISAIE<tab>But what of the other worlds, Your Radiance? With every calamity, you obliterate a star and every soul that dwells on it!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002860_ALISAIE<tab>霊災が起こるたびに消滅する、
鏡像世界に生きる人々はどうなるの！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002870_VARIS<tab>To the Ascians, we are all but tiny, momentary specks within an indifferent universe. We cannot hope to oppose them until we have been made whole once more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002870_VARIS<tab>人類全体の未来のためであれば、
我が身を含め、すべてが些末な犠牲に過ぎん！
我らが不完全なままでは、異形者どもには対抗できぬのだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002880_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Are these truly the words of Garlemald's ruler?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002880_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>そなたは……それでも統治者か……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002890_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>The flaws and foibles which you so abhor are what make us who we are. Every nation─even yours, Emperor Varis─is made whole through the combination of these imperfections, the strengths of one compensating for the weaknesses of another.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002890_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>人はみな、それぞれ違って当然じゃ。
国とは、不揃いで、不完全な者たちが、
寄り集まって形作られているものにほかならん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002900_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>While it is true that man succumbs all too often to anger and avarice, he may yet overcome his baser instincts through the forming of bonds with others, fostering community and cooperation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002900_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>確かに、ときには他者を妬み、戦い、奪い合うこともある。
しかし、それでも人は、懲りることなく寄り添い、
共生を諦めぬもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002910_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>That the protector of an empire should not only reject these fundamental truths, but seek to change them at so dear a cost to life is indefensible.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002910_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>そんな当然のことを、そなたは認めることができず、
暴挙に出てまで、人そのものを変えようとするとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002920_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Such a man is not fit to govern.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002920_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>人を束ねる統治者として、敗北していると思わぬか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002930_VARIS<tab>And you, Warrior of Light? Would you refuse me as well?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002930_VARIS<tab>エオルゼアの英雄よ、貴様はどうなのだ……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I cannot condone such a loss of life.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>犠牲には目をつぶれない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We can defeat the Ascians as we are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>不完全でもアシエンは倒せる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002940_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>It would seem the Alliance is of one mind on this matter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002940_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>英雄の言葉をもって、我らの総意は固まった！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002950_VARIS<tab>You Eorzeans never cease to disappoint me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002950_VARIS<tab>少しは話ができるものかと期待させられたが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002960_VARIS<tab>Though I suppose I have only myself to blame for expecting more from savages.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002960_VARIS<tab>盟主をはじめ「暁」の賢人も、英雄すらも、
所詮は愚かな蛮族だったか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002970_VARIS<tab>This discussion is at an end. I bid you make ready for our next meeting. It will not be at the negotiating table.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002970_VARIS<tab>交渉は決裂だ、去るがいい……。
ほどなく戦端は開かれよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002980_LYSE<tab>I'm not sure what I was expecting from our meeting with the Emperor, but it wasn't that. Still, at least we know now what he's really after!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002980_LYSE<tab>停戦合意には至らなかったけど、
皇帝の真意を知ることはできたね。
……まさか帝国がって感じではあるけど。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002990_RAUBAHN<tab>Aye, a future built on a mountain of bodies. I too want the Ascians dead─but not at any cost.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_002990_RAUBAHN<tab>ああ、それにしても、
アシエンを討つために霊災を起こすなど、本末転倒もいいところだ。
多大な犠牲を黙認した先に、未来などあるものか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_003000_HIEN<tab>The last of the reinforcements from Doma arrived not long ago. I pray it will be enough. Given the Emperor's stated goal, this is a battle we can ill afford to lose.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_003000_HIEN<tab>東方連合の援軍も、先ほど先遣隊が到着した。
もはや、わしらは祖国を護るためだけでなく、
世界の未来を賭けて戦うこととなったな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_003010_RAUBAHN<tab>If the Garleans come in force, we may not have much say in the matter...even with our combined strength.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_003010_RAUBAHN<tab>盟主たちも皆、同じ心構えで開戦に備えている。
だが、エオルゼア同盟と東方連合の力を合わせてもなお、
帝国の総力には敵わぬのが現実、厳しい戦いとなるだろう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_003020_HIEN<tab>We knew from the first that the odds would be against us. But if there is even the slightest chance of victory, we must do everything in our power to seize it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_003020_HIEN<tab>なに、わしらも劣勢なのは覚悟の上で馳せ参じた。
それも、負け戦を勝ち戦にするために来たのだ。
相手が強敵であろうが、戦うのみよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_003030_RAUBAHN<tab>We must seize it, full stop.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04500_003030_RAUBAHN<tab>……そうだな。
我らの底力を見せてやろう！
